item.description:
Are you a meetup member who has often thought how cool it would be to date other meetup members?  Here is the event for you....


12 Noon - Pre-Game:  Show up with a box of your favorite cereal and register.  We’ll be donating the cereal to a local food pantry.  You may bring a $10 donation in lieu of a box of cereal if you prefer.  However, part of the fun is sharing why the cereal you brought is your favorite.


12:30-1:30pm - 9 Innings of Dates:  This portion of the event will be like speed dating only we’re calling it ‘Cereal Dating!’  You will have blocks of time to sit down and chat with other attendees.  Maybe you will make a meetup match!


1:35pm Extra Innings-Grab your favorite date, watch the Sox game and then maybe the Pats game too.

 

Members are encouraged to bring a friend of the opposite sex. This will help us keep the male/female ratio balanced.


Please RSVP if you will attend and arrive on time. You must have a real photo posted in order to attend. Members who RSVP without a photo will be deleted from the Natives Meetup.
Scoreboard Sports Bar and Grill is a great place to socialize, have some food/drink and watch a game. Some other groups will be joining us…make sure you don’t miss out on the fun!


Note:  Please bring your favorite box of cereal to be donated to a local food pantry as an entry fee or a $10.00  donation.
item.name: You’ve heard of serial dating…now it's time to try Cereal Dating!
